name: Tinkerer's Infusion
entries: By studying arcane science, you have learned how to channel power into an item.

items: You learn one {@filter infuse item option|optionalfeatures|feature type=AI} of your choice from the artificer class. You can infuse only one item at a time in this way. If the infusion has a prerequisite, you can choose that infusion only if you are an artificer who meets the prerequisite.
If an infused item you use requires a target to make a saving throw to resist the item's effects, the save DC equals {@dc 8} + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier.
Whenever you gain a level, you can replace the infusion with another one from the artificer class.
